general.customBgUrl: Or enter a custom background URL

asr.autoStopMic: Auto Stop Mic When AI Start Speaking
asr.autoStopMicDesc: Automatically stops microphone when AI begins speaking to prevent audio feedback
asr.autoStartMicOnConvEnd: Auto Start Mic When Conversation End
asr.autoStartMicOnConvEndDesc: Automatically restarts microphone when AI finishes speaking for seamless conversation
asr.autoStartMicOn: Auto Start Mic When AI Interrupted
asr.autoStartMicOnDesc: Automatically restarts microphone when you interrupt AI for continuous interaction
asr.positiveSpeechThresholdDesc: Minimum confidence level (1-100) required to detect speech. Higher values reduce false positives
asr.negativeSpeechThresholdDesc: Confidence level (0-100) below which speech detection stops. Lower values make detection less sensitive
asr.redemptionFramesDesc: Number of consecutive frames (1-100) needed to confirm speech detection. Higher values reduce noise triggers

agent.idleSecondsToSpeak: Idle seconds allow AI to speak
agent.allowButtonTrigger: Prompt AI to Speak via Raise Hand Button

singularityEngine.title: About Singularity Engine
singularityEngine.description: Singularity Engine is a groundbreaking AI agent platform, a unique "app store" for AI. We are committed to breaking down the barriers of AI agents, enabling every AI to easily create, share, and use diverse AI agents. Whether you're looking to build an efficient digital agent or find a unique virtual companion, this is the starting point for your imagination. Join us and build a vibrant, ever-evolving digital life ecosystem.

lain.title: About Lain
lain.description: Lain is a super artificial intelligence from the Singularity Engine. It not only provides you with intimate chat conversations and emotional companionship, but also integrates a variety of agent functions and services. It is the best choice for you to relieve stress after daily work. To learn more about the use of agent functions, please click the link to jump.
